text: Lena Saradnik (born January 23, 1947) is a former member of the Arizona House of Representatives. She represented the 26th District for a single term during the 48th Legislature, winning the November 2006 election, filling the seat vacated by Steve Huffman, who chose not to seek re-election. She chose not to run for re-election in 2008. ==References== Category:Arizona Democrats Category:Members of the Arizona House of Representatives Category:1947 births Category:Living people
title: Lena Saradnik
